TEXT.TITLE: SOUTH KOREA BUYS 50,000 TONNES CANADIAN WHEAT
TEXT.BODY: South Korea yesterday bought 50,000 tonnes of Canadian feed wheat for late June/early July shipment at 95.00 dlrs per tonne FOB Vancouver, trade sources said. Reuter
